client.control

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.control.UserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController

    public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController
    UserController class handles the logics of login screen. The class implements IController interface.

    shays

    • Method Detail

      • onLoginButtonClick

        public void onLoginButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        onLoginButtonClick handles the login button click. The function checks the input fields, in case there are missing fields an error is displayed on the screen. In case all the fields are filled, the function sends a login request to the server.
        Parameters:
        event - the event

      • validateUser

        private void validateUser(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
        validateUser get the text input from username and password fields than creates a request message the function sends the request message to the server.
        Parameters:
        username - Get the username TextField
        password - Get the password PasswordField

        Parameters:
